info.description: The responses of the open api in swagger focus on the data field rather than the code and the message fields
info.title: Rainbow-API

get.description: Get the contract list containing the contracts deployed through the specified app.

post.description: Deploy a ERC721 or ERC1155 contract.

get.description: Get the sponsor of the specified contract according to address.

post.description: Set the sponsor for a specified contract according to the address

get.description: Get the file list containing the info of the files uploaded in the specified app

post.description: Upload a file which can be a video, an image and so on
Upload a file to OSS, which can be a video, an image and so on
Login the app to get the JWT according to the app_id and app_secret

get.description: Get the metadata list containing the info of the metadata created in the specified app

post.description: Create NFT metadata by providing the info including name, description and so on

get.description: Query the metadata according to metadata_id
Get the NFT list containing the NFTs minted in the specified app

post.description: Mint a NFT by providing a metadata url
Mint a NFT by uploading a file which can be a video, image and so on
Mint a NFT by providing a file url to create the metadata

get.description: Get the NFT list containing the transferred NFT information.

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL
